title: Replace site logo with latest uploaded PATIL Construction 3D logo

requirements.text: Generate a new square logo image from the latest uploaded PATIL Construction 3D logo wall mockup (use "patil construction 3d jpeg new-7.jpg" as the source): tightly crop to the logo mark, remove the wall/background, and export a transparent PNG at 512x512 into frontend/public/assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: A new transparent PNG logo asset exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/patil-logo-3d-new7.dim_512x512.png with dimensions 512x512.
The exported logo is tightly cropped to the logo mark with no visible wall/mockup background.

requirements.text: Update the website header and footer to use the newly generated logo asset "/assets/generated/patil-logo-3d-new7.dim_512x512.png" anywhere the current logo is rendered (replacing the current "/assets/generated/patil-logo-3d-new5.dim_512x512.png").
acceptanceCriteria: Logo remains visually balanced and not clipped across mobile and desktop breakpoints (current sizing behavior preserved: h-12 w-auto object-contain).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Serve images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not route images through the backend).
Keep all backend code in the single Motoko actor (no backend changes needed for this request).
nonGoals: Changing any site copy, layout structure, navigation, or service content beyond updating the logo asset references.
Adding backend persistence, APIs, or authentication changes.

required: Square-cropped logo mark with transparent background derived from patil construction 3d jpeg new-7.jpg (patil-logo-3d-new7.dim_512x512.png)
